edge: The German power metal band Blind Guardian recorded the movie's main theme, "Skalds and Shadows".

node_2: pilot in the sky of dreams
edge: The British progressive metal band Threshold contributed the song "Pilot in the Sky of Dreams" from their album Dead Reckoning to the movie's soundtrack.
The Swedish power metal band, HammerFall, also contributed a track, "The Fire Burns Forever", to the movie's soundtrack.
Wolfgang Herold was the executive soundtrack producer for the movie's soundtrack.
